narrative:
Hello and welcome to A.R.P.A. Universities.

We have invited you to study here for your excelent results in highschool. Don't worry, we're also giving you a scholarship.

Now, in which field would you like to specialize yourself in?

After 8 years of hard work you have finally passed all exams of your specialized study, which is truly magnificent.

Now you have finally time to spend researching on some ground breaking theories, which one will it be?
Ater you have finally finished your research on Nuclear Physics, you're starting to think about what you should to do next with you completed research.

You've really done it this time, you're the worlds largest competitor in Nuclear power plants.

However, you really need to cool your power plants better...

buttons.choiceText: Cool the Nuclear power plant using water.

narrative:
After 1 year, you have finally developed your newest cooling substance, but it came with some unfortunate effects. While you were to busy cooling all your power plants with your new substance called "Freon", you didn't realize how it could affect the Ozone layer.
With only 7 years of using "Freon" you burned holes through half the Ozone layer.

Great, you have cooled all your power plants effectively using water.

The only problem that remains is, how do we get rid of the nuclear water and waste?

buttons.choiceText: Dump your Nuclear waste in the ocean.
Dump your Nuclear waste in a small town.

narrative:
It took a while, but you have successfully dumped all your Nuclear waste in the ocean.

10 months later 97% of humanity died to Radiation Poisoning.

It took you years to collect and dump all your Nuclear waste in a small town. After only a few weeks everyone in the small town died of Radiation Poisoning.

You have been send to an CIA blacksite for "interogation".
After 24 years of precious and top secret work you have finally enough knowlegde about time travel. But how can you make the world a better place, or how would you like to spend your retirement?

buttons.choiceText: Invest your free time on research about Paradoxes.
Invest your time on World Wide issues.

narrative: After even more research about Time travel and Time paradoxes, you finally feal ready to help today's society, so what could we do for them?

buttons.choiceText: Travel back in time to prevent the Roman empire From collapsing.

narrative:
After hours of floating through the endless stream of time, you have finally arrived at 476 C.E.
With some time you have finally prevented the Roman Empire from collapsing, but by doing so, you won't have a reason to prevent the Roman Editing from collapsing in your timeline.

You broke time and space itself.

After a few minutes of floating through the stream of time, you have finally arrived at 4569, where you shall continue your research with new technologie. With an extra few years of research, you find a loophole to bring technologie from this timeline back to yours.

You have helped society to evolve faster.
After researching almost all World Wide problems, you have found 2 options you might be able to avoid.

buttons.choiceText: Prevent Robots from acquiring Artificial Intelligence.

narrative:
You travel through the seemingly endless stream of time, until you realize, it's truly endless.

You collapsed the foundation of Spacetime.

After endless attempts of stopping robots from gaining Artificial Intelligence, you lose all hope. While a government research facility was testing new Artificial Intelligence, the software uploaded itself through the ARPANET. The software made itself a rootkit so it could not be removed from a robots memory.

The robots took over almost the entire planet.

buttons.choiceText: Start your own online media company.
You choose to make electronics with your copper.
You choose not to change your production.
Supply your cable's to house building.
Supply your cable's for laptop factory's.
Choose to supply to the NS.
Go on and not change anything.
Build a machine to Mass Produce robots.
Let the Government use them as police officers.
Use your system to prevent terrorism.
Use your system to monitor the country.
Use your system to monitor the country.
Use your system to prevent terrorism.
Build a Nuclear device to survive.
Refuse to build a Nuclear device.

narrative: You have been accepted in the school, now you have to chose the direction your study.

buttons.choiceText: You invest in the smaller things, Like really small, Like damn that is fucking small... anyway, You will try to modify micro organisms so you know how they work, so you can later, With a bit of time, Make them yourself.
You invest in being lazy, but not in a bad way, I mean everyone knows that automation is the way to go forward, and to make an automatic gene machine is a handy thing, take it from me

narrative: You have invested in the smaller things, and now know a lot about Micro-organisms and there uses, how about we do something with that knowledge.

buttons.choiceText: Oil has been around a for a bit now and we know it is bad for nature, maybe it could be handy to make something that will eat the oil in case of a massive spill
We all know the idea of nanobots, i mean science fiction has tons of them, but why not make that fantasy reality?

narrative: This is amazing, we have no problems with getting rid of oil spills anymore! But, now what do you chose to do next?

buttons.choiceText: With a "wild" discovery you discover that there is a lot of CO2 in the air and you know that plants filter a bit of it out of the air, so why not help them improve

You have made something that eats oil, but why stop there? Im sure you can think of something that could save lifes to remove it... Oh, I know! why not make something to eat away a dangerus decieses? like... cancer! lets fix cancer.

narrative: While you made something that eats the oil spills, the air was still polluted, not anymore tho since you and your plants fixed that.

buttons.choiceText: You cleared the air of filth, so lets clear the ground of filth, lets make some weapons.
Although your flowers are working amazingly, maybe you can do something with the left over matter... maybe you can manipulate it to make completly other things

narrative: You have always thought that this was cool and wanted to make it reality, and you did! You made a matter manipulator, just throw stuff in and out comes a big mac, and with this you also saved the world from it self, I mean: got uranium waste? Throw it in the matter manipulator and make something new from it, good job.
You never really liked humans so... Why not threaten them with a world ending weapon?
You have made the virus that should eat away all sorts of cancer without doing any harm... Lets hope it works
It worked! You solved cancer and with this tech you can probably fix all diseases, shame the earth wont allow that, I mean your the one that polluted it so... Have fun dieing :D
Well... You accidentally created a zombie virus, How? Don't ask me, your the one who did it! Anyway good luck.
you made nanobots! Now how will you use them?

buttons.choiceText: Nobody likes terrorists, and you can probably fight them with your nanobots, and your gonna do exactly that, and while your at it, studdy some other weapons as well
Nanobots can be versital, maybe you can help the medical field

narrative: You chose to make your nanobots a medical assistance. But how?

buttons.choiceText: Lets be honest, you might not like to go outside but being able to move is unmisable, lets help the people who can't.
Fuck natural disasters! No really, nobody likes them, so... lets make sure that that will never happen anymore...

narrative: Automation is the best but now, what will you do with this research material?

buttons.choiceText: Being able to read and modify genes could be handy, maybe you can solve a world problem?
Humans are interesting, why not learn some more?

narrative: Making more food seems like a perfect choice, didn't it?

You accidentaly made a zombie virus, but because your assistant was too eager to show. Now 20% of humanity are now zombies, and 60% of humanity is dead. But hey, over populaition and hunger are now fixed right?
It worked! But you don't have enough water for the entire world, so you're still doomed.
Now that you have grown the chromosomes to really think, lets think harder.

buttons.choiceText: Lets build an army, I mean, super soldiers sounds good.
Lets edit humans, I mean, What could go wrong?

narrative: You hsve weaponized everyone in existance. You called yourself the borg and are now exlporing space, and only you, have a mind of your own.
Editing human reaction speed and other minor things a bit is fun and all, but lets take it to the next level.

buttons.choiceText: You deside its a good idea to mix humans and animals... no complaint from me
You know what? this whent out of hand, lets fix it before this too late

narrative: Great job! Fury's, neko's, scalies, fox girls, ect. all exist now... At one cost, war! Good luck because people will start knocking on your door.
